channel.title: Standalone on Densha de GO! controller documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Standalone on Densha de GO! controller documentation

item.title: Densha de GO! Plug and Play
item.description: Overview Name Densha de GO! Plug and Play Release date February 8, 2018 Serial code Notes Technical details This controller is a self-contained console with a modified version of Densha de GO! Final. Externally, it looks similar to a TCPP-20009, except it does not include a pedal connection. It requires a micro USB cable for power and a HDMI cable for video output. Internally, it contains an ARM board running a Linux distro.

item.title: Densha de GO! Plug and Play 2
item.description: Overview Name Densha de GO! Plug and Play 2 Release date December 7, 2023 Serial code TPP-D-002 Notes Technical details This controller is a self-contained console with a modified version of Densha de GO! Shinkansen EX San’y≈ç Shinkansen Hen. Externally, it looks similar to a TCPP-20011, except it does not include a pedal connection and top display. It requires a USB-C cable for power and a HDMI cable for video output.
